LatestNews.Content: KRON Bay Area 4 reports former Bengals and Raiders LB Thomas Howard was killed Monday in a high-speed car accident on an Oakland highway.

LatestNews.Title: Ex-Bengals, Raiders LB Howard passes away

LatestNews.Content: Bengals WLB Thomas Howard is out for the season after tearing his ACL in Wednesday's practice.
